title: Leading trailers in the U.S. January 2020 , by weekly TV ad spend
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Spending in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 1917 to Dolittle, and finally roughly constant from Dolittle to Like_a_Boss.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1917 and Bad_Boys_for_Life.
Maximum Spending in million U.S. dollars, about 10.41 was reported at Year 1917
The lowest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 3.72 was reported at Year Just_Mercy
